result.reason: RDP sessions can fail with NLA error 2825 on some hosts, and a configurable AuthenticationLevel can fix affected connections while preserving current defaults.
result.approach: Add an optional per-connection/default AuthenticationLevel setting, persist it, and apply it to the RDP control before connect with legacy-safe default behavior.

attempts.raw_output: {"decision":"implement","reason":"RDP sessions can fail with NLA error 2825 on some hosts, and a configurable AuthenticationLevel can fix affected connections while preserving current defaults.","priority":"P2-bug","estimated_files":["mRemoteNG/Connection/ConnectionInfo.cs","mRemoteNG/Protocols/RDP/RdpProtocol.cs","mRemoteNG/UI/Forms/ConnectionForm.cs"],"approach":"Add an optional per-connection/default AuthenticationLevel setting, persist it, and apply it to the RDP control before connect with legacy-safe default behavior."}
